name: PathPilot
long_description: Fintechs, banks, and other institutions managing financial services face constant pressure to reduce costs, enhance customer experience, and ensure regulatory compliance. PathPilot provides the speed of pre-built AI agents combined with the flexibility of full customization. This enables internal teams to remain in full controlâ€”designing, deploying, and governing AI solutions independently, without reliance on external vendors.
one_liner: AI platform helping fintech/bank teams scale efficiently
